adding-speed.png.description: A side-by-side comparison of the code changes required to add a speed to the non-nested and nested versions of the pinwheels file. The nested version requires far fewer changes.

adding-x-coordinates.png.description: A side-by-side comparison of the code changes required to add x-coordinates to the non-nested and nested versions of the pinwheels file. The nested version requires far fewer changes.
